title: Handlebars
content: Handlebars is a popular templating engine for web development that allows you to create dynamic HTML pages by inserting variables, conditionals, and loops into your markup. It provides a simple and intuitive syntax for creating reusable templates that can be populated with data from your application. With Handlebars, you can separate your presentation logic from your application logic and create clean, maintainable code.

title: MySQL
content: MySQL is an open-source relational database management system that uses SQL (Structured Query Language) to manage and manipulate data. It is one of the most popular and widely-used databases in the world, known for its scalability, security, and reliability. MySQL can be used for a wide range of applications, from small personal projects to large enterprise applications, and can be integrated with many different programming languages and frameworks. It is commonly used for web development, including powering popular content management systems such as WordPress and Drupal.

title: Express
content: Express is a popular web application framework for Node.js. It provides a set of robust features to develop web and mobile applications. Express helps to manage server-side functionalities, routing, middleware, and handling HTTP requests and responses. With its simple API and easy-to-use syntax, Express has become a go-to framework for developers building web applications using Node.js. Express also has a large ecosystem of plugins and modules, making it easy to integrate with other tools and services.

title: Bootstrap
content: Bootstrap is a popular front-end framework for building responsive and mobile-first web applications. It provides a collection of CSS and JavaScript components that make it easier to create modern and visually appealing interfaces with minimal effort. Bootstrap includes pre-designed UI elements such as buttons, forms, navigation menus, modals, and more, as well as a responsive grid system that allows developers to easily create layouts that adapt to different screen sizes. Additionally, Bootstrap is highly customizable, allowing developers to modify the appearance and behavior of its components to fit their specific needs..

content: It's not the prettiest, but it's getting there.
